thread.title: Trump Administration to Advance Plan to Restrict Funding for Abortion Providers

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Trump Administration to Advance Plan to Restrict Funding for Abortion Providers

organizations.name: department of health and human services

text:
WASHINGTON—The Trump administration will move ahead with restrictions on funding access for family planning providers that offer abortion services, the Department of Health and Human Services said Tuesday.
The announcement came shortly before President Donald Trump was addressed the annual gala of the Susan B. Anthony List, a group that supports antiabortion candidates for federal office. There, Mr. Trump said his administration had made a “historic announcement” and “kept another promise.”
...
